titleStmt.title: At the court at York, 28 Martii, 1642 His Majestie hath given me expresse command to give you this his answer to your petition.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
Nicholas, Edward, Sir, 1593-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker ... and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Text begins: That this petition (as some others of this nature) is grounded upon misinformation ...
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
